response.overview: This is the heartwarming story about a young puppy dog and his fight to save his mom and friends from the dark and dingy dog pound. A combination of determination -- and a profound faith in the words of his mother -- drives young Boxer George to escape his fate and to become a new hero sitting at the side of Santa Claus. This is a story about love, faith, hard work and the unbreakable bond between between a mom and her son. A wonderful surprise ending will warm the hearts of kids and parents everywhere. This holiday special is bound to become a favorite with kids and their parents this holiday season.
response.title: Boxer George the Pet Santa
